amendment.description: Amendment gives States the option of denying public education benefits to illegal aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that gives States the option to deny public education to illegal aliens. Under the amendment, if States were asked, they would be required to provide a hearing to establish whether an alien is lawfully present in the United States.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 163 (Roll No. 75).
